Translations.Text: alipha-lam-ro. A allahani kitabani ayato che ane spasta ane prakasita kura'anani
evo pana samaya hase jyare inkara karanara musalamana thavani iccha darsavase
tame te'one khatam, phayado uthavatam ane asa'omam vyasta chodi do, te'o najikamam ja jani lese
ko'i vastine tena nakki karela samaya pahela ame nasta nathi kari
ko'i jutha potana mrtyuthi na agala vadhe che ane na to pachala khase che
te'o'e kahyum ke, he te vyakti! Jena para kura'ana avatarita karavamam avyum che, kharekhara tum to ko'i pagala che
jo tame saca ja cho, to amari pase pharista'one kema nathi la'i avata
ame pharista'one satya sathe ja utari'e chi'e ane te samaye temane mahetala apavamam nathi avati
ame ja a kura'anane avatarita karyum che ane ame ja teni suraksa karanara che
ame tamara pahelani komamam pana potana payagambara mokalya
ane je pana payagambara avata, te'o temani thaththamaskari karata
papi'ona hrdayomam ame avi ja rite avum thasavi da'i'e chi'e
te'o temana para imana nathi lavata ane ni:Sanka agalana lokothi aja rita cali rahi che
ane jo ame temana mate akasana dvara kholi pana nankhi'e ane a loko tena para cadhava pana lage
to pana avum ja kahese ke amari ankho dhoko kha'i rahi che athava to amara para jadu kari devamam avyum che
Ni:Sanka ame akasomam “burujo” (surya,candra,tara, vagere...) Banavya ane jonara'o mate tene sanagari devamam avyum che
ane dareka dhikkarela setanathi teni raksa kari
ham, jo ko'i chupi rite sambhalavano prayatna kare, teni pachala salagelo (golo) lagi jaya che
ane dharatine ame phelavi didhi ane tena para parvatone nakhi didha ane temam ame dareka vastune eka mapa pramane upajavi didhi che
ane temam ja ame tamari roji banavi didhi che ane jemane tame roji apanara nathi
ane jetali pana vastu'o che te badhanna khajana amari pase che ane ame dareka vastune tena mapasara ja utari'e chi'e
ane ame bhare hava'o mokali'e chi'e, pachi akasa manthi pani varasavi te tamane pivadavi'e chi'e ane tame teno sangraha karanara nathi
ame ja jivana pradana kari'e chi'e ane ame ja mrtyu pana api'e chi'e ane ame ja (chevate) varasa che
ane tamara manthi agala vadhanara ane pachala rahi janara pana amari janakarimam che
tamaro palanahara badhanne bhega karase, ni:Sanka te khuba ja hikamatavalo, khuba ja jnanavalo che
ni:Sanka ame manusyanum sarjana, kali, sadeli ane khanakhana bolanari matithi karyum
ane a pahela ame jinnatonum sarjana, lum vali aga vade karyum
ane jyare tara palappnahare pharista'one kahyum ke hum eka manusyanum sarjana kali, sadeli ane khanakhana bolanari mati vade karavano chum
to jyare hum tene sampurna banavi la'u ane temam potani ruha phunki da'um, to tame sau tena mate sijado karajo
chevate dareka pharista'o'e sijado karyo
parantu iblisa sivaya, ke tena sijado karavavalo manthi thavano inkara karyo
(Allaha ta'ala'e) kahyum he iblisa! Tane sum thayum ke tum sijado karanara'o manthi na thayo
tene kahyum ke, hum evo nathi ke te manusyane sijado karum jene te kali, sadeli ane khanakhana bolanari mati vade banavyo
kahyum, have jannata manthi nikali ja, karanake tu dhikkarelo che
ane tara para mari phitakara kayamata sudhi che
kaheva lagyo ke he mara palanahara! Mane te divasa sudhini mahetala api de ke jyare loko biji vara jivita karavamam avase
kahyum ke sarum tum te loko manthi che jemane mahetala mali che
nakki karela divasa sudhi

(saitane) kahyum ke he mara palanahara! Jo ke te mane pathabhrasta kari didho che. Hum pana soganda kha'um che ke hum pana dharati para temana mate gunane sanagari da'isa ane te badhane pathabhrasta pana karisa
tara te banda'o sivaya, je'one pasanda kari levamam avya che
kahyum ke, ham, a ja mara sudhi pahoncava mateno satya marga che
mara banda'o para taro ko'i prabhava nathi, parantu ham je pathabhrasta loko tarum anusarana karase
ni:Sanka te saunum thekanum jahannama che
jena sata dvara che, dareka dvara mate temano eka bhaga vahencayelo che
daravavala jannati loko, bagica'o ane jharana'omam hase
(temane kahevamam avase) salamati ane santi sathe amam pravesa karo
temana hrdayomam je kami pana kapata ane nirasa hati, ame badhum ja kadhi la'isum, te bha'i-bha'i bani eka-bija same asano para betha hase
na to tyam temane ko'i takalipha sparsa kari sake che ane na to te'o tyanthi kyareya kadhavamam avase
mara banda'one janavi do ke hum ghano ja mapha karanara ane ghano ja dayalu chum
ane sathe sathe mari yatana pana atyanta du:Khadayi che
Te'one ibrahima (a.Sa.)Na mahemano vise janavo
ke jyare temane temani pase avi salama kahyum, to temane kahyum ke amane to tamarathi dara lage che
te'o'e kahyum ke daro nahim, ame tamane eka jnani balakani khusakhabara api'e chi'e
kahyum sum a vrd'dhavastha'e pahoncya pachi tame mane khusakhabara apo cho, a khusakhabara tame kevi rite api rahya cho
te'o'e kahyum ke ame tamane saci khusakhabari api rahya chi'e. Tame nirasa loko manthi na tha'i java
kahyum ke potana palanaharani krpathi nirasa to phakata pathabhrasta loko ane bhatakela loko ja thaya che
puchyum ke, allaha'e mokalela (pharista'o)! Tamarum evum sum agatyanum kama che
temane javaba apyo ke ame aparadhi loko tarapha mokalavamam avya che
parantu lutana kutumbijano sivaya ame te saune jarura bacavi la'isum
temani patni sivaya, ame tenine roka'i janara'o ane baki rahevavala'o manthi nakki kari didhi che
jyare mokalela pharista luta (a.Sa.) Na kutumbijano pase pahoncya
to temane (luta a.Sa.)E kahyum ke tame to ko'i ajanya lago cho
te'o'e (pharista'o'e) kahyum! Na, parantu ame tari pase te vastu la'ine avya chi'e jena vise a loko sankamam hata
ame to tamari pase (spasta) satya la'ine avya chi'e ane kharekhara saci che

have tame potana kutumbijano sathe ratrina ko'i praharamam cali nikalo ane tame te'oni pachala rahejo ane (khabaradara) tamara manthi ko'i (pachala) cahero pheravine na ju'e. Ane je jagya parano adesa tamane apavamam avi rahyo che tyam jata rahejo
ane ame temana mate e vatano nirnaya kari lidho ke savara thatam ja te lokona mula ukhadi phenkisum
ane saheravala'o khusi manavata avya
(Luta a.Sa. E) kahyum, a loko mara mahemana che, marum apamana na karo
allaha ta'alathi daro ane marum apamana na karo
te'o'e kahyum sum ame tamane akhi duniyani (thekedari) thi rokya nathi
(luta a.Sa. E) kahyum, jo tamare kamika karavum ja hoya to a mari balaki'o che
tamari vayana soganda! Te to potani khoti mastimam ja hata
basa! Surya nikalata ja temane eka mota avaje pakadi lidha
chevate ame te saherane upara kari didhum ane te loko para kankari'o jeva paththara varasavya
ni:Sanka jonara mate amam ghani ja nisani'o che
a vasti saman'ya margani vacce avati hati
ane temam imanavala'o mate ghani nisani'o che
“ayakaha” vastina rahevasi'o pana ghana atyacari hata
jemanathi ame badalo lidho, a banne sahera saman'ya marga upara hata
ane hijara vala'o'e pana payagambarone juthalavya
ane ame temane potani nisani'o pana batavi. Parantu te loko te nisani'oni avaganana ja karata rahya
a loko nidaratathi parvatone kotarine ghara banavata hata
chevate te'one pana savara thata ja cise pakadi lidha
basa! Temani ko'i yukti athava karya'e kami pana phayado na pahoncadyo
ame akasa ane dharati ane te banne vacceni dareka vastunum satya sathe sarjana karyum. Ane kayamata jarura avase. Basa! Tame sari rite daragujara karo
ni:Sanka tamaro palanahara ja sarjana karanara ane janavavalo che
ni:Sanka ame tamane sata ayato api rakhi che, je varanvara padhavamam ave che ane prabhavasali kura'ana pana api rakhyum che

Tame kyareya potani najara te vastu tarapha na karo, jena karane ame temana manthi ketalaya prakarana lokone dhanistha banavya che. Na temana para tame nirasa thaso ane imanavala'o mate potani “baju” jhukavi rakho
ane kahi do ke hum to spasta rite saceta karanaro chum
jevi rite ke ame te matabheda karanara'o mate utari hati
je'o'e te allahani kitabana tukade-tukada kari nakhya
soganda che tamara palanaharani! Ame te badhane jarura puchisum
dareka te babata vise je te'o karata hata
basa! Tame te adesane je tamane apavamam avyo che, spasta rite janavi do ane musarikothi modhum pheravi lo
tamari sathe je loko maskari kare che temani saja mate ame purata che
je allahani sathe bijane pujya nakki kare che temane najikamam ja jana tha'i jase
ame khuba sari rite jani'e chi'e ke temani vatothi tamarum hrdaya khuba paresana thaya che
tame potana palanaharana namanum smarana ane prasansanum varnana karata raho ane sijado karanara'omam tha'i java
ane potana palanaharani bandagi karata raho tyam sudhi ke tame mrtyu pamo
